title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Enhancing Online Teaching Education Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Instructional Theories and Experience in Using Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Learners are university students or job seekers aiming to enhance practical competencies in online education design and implementation. Project-based assessments evaluate their ability to apply skills in real educational settings.

learning_goals: Develop five-week microlearning modules by applying core principles of online instructional design (interaction design, content structuring, assessment methods)
Create activity materials that enhance learner engagement by over 20% using digital tools (quiz makers, video editors, LMS)
Present case studies of improved existing lecture materials by applying iterative instructional design processes reflecting learner feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
